snippet: Isaiah Thomas had 30 points to lead the Boston Celtics to their fourth straight win, 116-93 over the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday night....
lead_paragraph: Isaiah Thomas had 30 points to lead the Boston Celtics to their fourth straight win, 116-93 over the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Thomas Helps Celtics Beat Blazers for 12th Straight Home Win
headline.print_headline: Thomas Helps Celtics Beat Blazers for 12th Straight Home Win
